attributes.comment:
The definition of Sex is important in life, medicine and law. Falsifying a person's sex could lead to medical misinformation, malpractice and serious life-altering implications.
Humans are either:
MALE OR FEMALE, AND IT CANNOT BE CHANGED! There are no other types of humans, no matter what someone presents as.
This was widely accepted & normal until about 5 minutes ago.

Keep the definition of SEX as 99.9% of people know it as.
People who have a mental illness that makes them think they should have been the other sex need mental help. NOT PANDERED TO. Reality needs to be respected and honored.
